title: Google, Meta, Microsoft, other tech executives to testify before US Senate about election threats
description: Executives from Google, Adobe, Microsoft, and Meta Platforms will testify at a U.S. Senate Intelligence Committee hearing on election threats. The hearing aims to address efforts to combat disinformation and misinformation online related to the upcoming Nov. 5 election between Vice President Kamala Harris and former President Donald Trump.
content: Executives from major tech firms like Google, Adobe, Microsoft and Meta Platforms will testify next week at a U.S. Senate Intelligence Committee hearing on election threats.
